structure.unit: A UNIFORM MILITARY AND OVERSEAS VOTERS ACT

law.catch_line: Declaration concerning material misstatement of fact.
law.text: A military-overseas ballot shall include or be accompanied by a declaration signed by the voter that a material misstatement of fact in completing the ballot may be grounds for a conviction of perjury under the laws of the United States or the Commonwealth of Kentucky.
law.history: Created 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 131, sec. 13, effective July 1, 2014.
